criteria.template: Two different kinds of loops used
criteria.description: The program uses two different types of loops (for, repeat, while, or for-of).

criteria.template: A custom function exists and gets called
criteria.description: A user-defined function is created and called in the program.

criteria.template: At least one block has comments
criteria.description: At least one code block has a comment attached to it.
All user-defined functions in the program have comments attached to them.

criteria.template: At least one custom variable is set
criteria.description: At least one user-defined variable is set to a value.

criteria.template: At least one variable is accessed
criteria.description: At least one variable's value is read.

criteria.template: A custom variable's value is set to a random number
criteria.description: A user-defined variable has its value set to a random number.
The 'pick random' block from the math category is used at least once.
The program compares two numbers for equality at least once.
